tasks.description: Write at least 150 words describing and summarising visual information (charts, tables, processes, maps) by selecting and comparing key features in a clear, academic-style report.[web:7][web:10][web:13]

upgrade_strategies: Practise identifying and underlining two or three main trends or changes before writing.

bands.descriptor_summary_vi: Attempts the task but presents a confusing or incomplete description of the visual with serious omissions or inaccuracies.[web:1][web:2][web:11]

upgrade_strategies: Group data logically (e.g. highest vs lowest, early vs late years) instead of listing every number.[web:19][web:24]
Ensure the overview summarises both general trends and major contrasts, not just one aspect.[web:18][web:24]

bands.descriptor_summary_vi: Meets all task requirements by presenting a clear overview and accurately describing the main features with appropriate detail.[web:1][web:2][web:11]
